mobileResponsivenessTip: Improve touch target sizes for easier navigation on smaller screens.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize image sizes and minimize heavy JavaScript to improve load times.
seoOptimizationTip: Enhance keyword optimization in meta tags and page content for better search visibility.
userExperienceTip: Ensure more intuitive access to booking options from every page.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the number of steps needed to finalize the booking process.
